headline.main: VOTERS SEE BRITISH SEEKING U.S. ARMY; Some Believe Nation Already Has Asked for Our Troops, Gallup Survey Finds

lead_paragraph: PRINCETON, N.J., May 2 -- Like the cautious man who prepares for the worst while hoping for the best, the American public has never been over-optimistic about this country's chances of staying out of the European war -- even though it strongly desires to stay out of a shooting war if possible.
abstract: 20% believe Brit has not or will not ask for troops
